Uses of Interface
org.vulcanium.scheduler.VulcaniumTask

Packages that use VulcaniumTask
Package
Description
org.vulcanium.scheduler
Classes dedicated to letting plugins run code at specific time intervals, including thread safety.

  • Uses of VulcaniumTask in org.vulcanium.scheduler

    Methods in org.vulcanium.scheduler that return VulcaniumTask
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    VulcaniumTask
    VulcaniumRunnable.runTask(Plugin plugin)
    Schedules this in the Vulcanium scheduler to run on next tick.
    VulcaniumTask
    VulcaniumScheduler.runTask(Plugin plugin, Runnable task)
    Returns a task that will run on the next server tick.
    VulcaniumTask
    VulcaniumScheduler.runTask(Plugin plugin, VulcaniumRunnable task)
    Deprecated.
    Use VulcaniumRunnable.runTask(Plugin)
    VulcaniumTask
    VulcaniumRunnable.runTaskAsynchronously(Plugin plugin)
    Asynchronous tasks should never access any API in Vulcanium.
    VulcaniumTask
    VulcaniumScheduler.runTaskAsynchronously(Plugin plugin, Runnable task)
    Asynchronous tasks should never access any API in Vulcanium. Great care should be taken to assure the thread-safety of asynchronous tasks.
    VulcaniumTask
    VulcaniumScheduler.runTaskAsynchronously(Plugin plugin, VulcaniumRunnable task)
    Deprecated.
    Use VulcaniumRunnable.runTaskAsynchronously(Plugin)
    VulcaniumTask
    VulcaniumRunnable.runTaskLater(Plugin plugin, long delay)
    Schedules this to run after the specified number of server ticks.
    VulcaniumTask
    VulcaniumScheduler.runTaskLater(Plugin plugin, Runnable task, long delay)
    Returns a task that will run after the specified number of server ticks.
    VulcaniumTask

    Deprecated.
    Use VulcaniumRunnable.runTaskLater(Plugin, long)
    VulcaniumTask

    Asynchronous tasks should never access any API in Vulcanium.
    VulcaniumTask
    VulcaniumScheduler.runTaskLaterAsynchronously(Plugin plugin, Runnable task, long delay)
    Asynchronous tasks should never access any API in Vulcanium. Great care should be taken to assure the thread-safety of asynchronous tasks.
    VulcaniumTask
    VulcaniumScheduler.runTaskLaterAsynchronously(Plugin plugin, VulcaniumRunnable task, long delay)
    Deprecated.
    Use VulcaniumRunnable.runTaskLaterAsynchronously(Plugin, long)
    VulcaniumTask
    VulcaniumRunnable.runTaskTimer(Plugin plugin, long delay, long period)
    Schedules this to repeatedly run until cancelled, starting after the specified number of server ticks.
    VulcaniumTask
    VulcaniumScheduler.runTaskTimer(Plugin plugin, Runnable task, long delay, long period)
    Returns a task that will repeatedly run until cancelled, starting after the specified number of server ticks.
